```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

2021 VAST Challenge Mini-Challenge 2 described a scenario where analysts should identify patterns and anomalies using both geospatial and temporal datasets. Our project aims to provide an interactive Shiny application to help readers explore popular locations, linkage between cards, GPS routes and potential relationships.
